name: Bubble Fruit Saga
description:
Welcome to Bubble Fruit Saga!

Enjoy the freshness of juice splash!

Game features:
✔ Enjoy the awesomeness about slicing fruit
✔ Sweet smell of juice splashing
✔ Hundreds of unique pop-bubble levels
✔ Release your pressure, relax your body and mind
✔ Simple and smooth operation
✔ Beautiful pictures
✔ Harmonious  music

This wonderful bubble game can allows you to experience the magic of match-3 games, and the thrill of fruit-slicing!

Download now and enjoy hundreds of hours!

Liked the game?
WE WOULD LOVE TO GET YOUR FEEDBACK! 
Your reviews/ratings are very important to us, and they’ll help us bring you free updates with more great features and exciting new games! 

Have any questions for us? Contact our support team at
bigcat@nova520-cn.com

Follow us for news, updates and fun surprises!
